name: Snow Hillroad Driving Challeng
description:
Snow Hillroad Driving Challenge is a thrilling, adventurous, craziest monster 6x6 truck driving and racing game. So test your all snow driving skills in the beautiful hilly and mountains environment. You have racing, parking and other cargo services to perform in this game to unlock next level. So become the best driver in racing, driving in this game
Features
- Realistic off road hilly and snow Environment.
- Beautiful Mountains with snow and High Quality Grahpics.
- 6X6 Offroad beautiful truck and jeeps.
- Three types of control for driving the 6x6 trucks.
